name: Tiny Warfare
description:
Tiny Warfare is a fast paced 2D multiplayer shooter game with different game modes.
Currently limited amount of player can play same time . Your Support goes for  new servers  to more people will be able to play together.

You can create custom game currently 3 different modes : Deathmatch, Sniper Only, Shotgun Only. 

Currently many new features in working progress  just a few of them :
- Level up system
- Quick match 
- Private Games
- New weapons and new map   

DOWNLOADING & PLAY :
- download the zip file , extract it
- start GAMELAUNCHER ...
- wait until the "Downloading Game " turns to Play 
- PRESS PLAY and have fun

The launcher will handle the new Updates .
